I believe the quote is "Ask, and ye shall receive".
It's not "how dare you =
ask God anything!?"=C2=A0 Who do you think you are?"

:-)

      =C2=A0Asking questions is presumptu=
ous at best, and what if ya don't ask the right question, like who the F---=
 are you really? Not asking questions is letting go and trusting something =
higher than your ego. The concept is, try to get your head around this--"ho=
w dare you ask God anything!?"=C2=A0 Who do you think you are?

=C2=A0
=C2=
=A0F-S

o me to be making it all magical and mysterious. Asking questions is the mo=
st natural way to find out something from someone.
